blogPost.excerpt: https://www.rutterapi.com helps you build 1 integration that works with Shopify, WooCommerce, and many more Ecommerce platforms. Push & pull Products, Orders, and Customers data with one set of endpoints. https://docs.rutterapi.com

localize.description: https://www.rutterapi.com 帮助你建立1个集成，与Shopify、WooCommerce以及更多的电商平台合作。用一组端点推拉产品、订单和客户数据。https://docs.rutterapi.com。

previous.excerpt: CFO Yeah! brings you up close with finance leaders in the most exciting, fastest-growing companies in the world. In each episode, you meet CFOs who believe that finance is another key driver for growth - just as vital as sales and marketing.
previous.title: CFO Yeah! - Your new favorite finance podcast

localize.description: CFO Yeah！》带您近距离接触世界上最激动人心、发展最快的公司的财务负责人。在每期节目中，您将见到那些相信财务是另一个关键的增长动力的CFO们，他们与销售和营销一样重要。
CFO Yeah！》帶您近距離接觸世界上最激動人心、發展最快的公司的財務負責人。在每期節目中，您將見到那些相信財務是另一個關鍵的增長動力的CFO們，他們與銷售和營銷一樣重要。
